oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Wilder Monument, Chickamauga Battlefield
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of the Wilder Tower, also known as the Wilder Brigade Monument, at the Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park. Features a white border with an undivided back and handwritten correspondence on reverse. January 28, 1907 postmark. [No. 1944] This postcard comes from the Catherine Berry Pilcher Avery Papers (1736-1971) collection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga Battlefield (Ga.); Chickamauga (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Monuments & memorials
